text: Movie Star Inc. is a New York City-based manufacture, marketer, and seller of lingerie, sleepwear and other types of clothing. Organized in 1935, and then formerly known as Sandmark Stardust Inc. in 1992. It was acquired by Frederick's of Hollywood in 2006, who sold the company to Dolce Vita Intimates in 2010. ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Companies based in New York City Category:American clothing companies
title: Movie Star (company)
